events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product does not match what I originally purchased.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning the refund request case to agent Sarah for further assistance.
Hello! I'm Sarah and I'll help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the product I received; also, my order number is 123456. Please process my refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund processing.
The refund process has been completed, and the amount should reflect in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case. Please reach out anytime for further assistance.
